style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 25.18%;top: 2.69%;width: 6.21%;height: 4.53%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;

text:
いつか
いい探偵に
なれる…
私のように
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.49%;top: 12.40%;width: 10.38%;height: 9.39%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
さっき
コケたのは
アンタの
足か…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.63%;top: 4.26%;width: 10.50%;height: 9.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ずっと
いたのか!?
アンタの
仕業か?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56.86%;top: 3.09%;width: 11.10%;height: 8.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
彼女がミステリーを
誕生会に希望してね
彼女の父親に
仕事もあったし
善意の対応だよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.45%;top: 2.25%;width: 18.26%;height: 9.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
皆で結構な
額をお支払い
したけどね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79.42%;top: 11.72%;width: 12.41%;height: 6.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
お前は
もっと外に出て
女の子と会うべき
だと思ってた
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 14.14%;top: 40.39%;width: 14.80%;height: 8.47%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
もちろん
リンゴみたいな
彼氏が良いなら
それもよし
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.33%;top: 44.92%;width: 13.72%;height: 8.55%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
正直言うと
大学時代
幾人かの男と
付き合ってたよ
お前のママと
結婚する前ね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.53%;top: 56.57%;width: 14.80%;height: 10.98%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
アンタと
そんな話を
する気はねぇ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.55%;top: 57.49%;width: 15.99%;height: 7.88%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 34.79%;top: 77.44%;width: 8.11%;height: 6.45%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
完全に
透明って
ことは…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.75%;top: 58.50%;width: 10.62%;height: 5.11%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 47.20%;top: 82.14%;width: 12.41%;height: 6.12%;ext-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;
